version.name: Get employer fraction calculations
version.description: Returns a list of fraction calculations for a given employer reference.

param.name: empref
param.value: A valid (URL encoded) employer reference for the PAYE scheme.

param.name: fromDate
param.value: The date of the earliest calculation to return.

param.name: toDate
param.value: The date of the latest calculation to return.

field.name: empref
field.description: The PAYE Reference for the employer. This will be the same as provided in the URL.

field.name: fractionCalculations[].calculatedAt
field.description: The date that the fractions were calculated

field.name: fractionCalculations[].fractions[].region
field.description: The region the specific fraction applies to. Will always be England for the forseeable future.

field.name: fractionCalculations[].fractions[].value
field.description: The fraction calculated for the region. Will be a decimal in the range 0 to 1.
